query:
UPDATE tasks SET category = CASE 
  WHEN name LIKE '%ฐานราก%' THEN 'structure'
  WHEN name LIKE '%เสา%' THEN 'structure'
  WHEN name LIKE '%คาน%' OR name LIKE '%พื้น%' THEN 'structure'
  WHEN name LIKE '%อิฐ%' OR name LIKE '%ผนัง%' THEN 'architecture'
  WHEN name LIKE '%หลังคา%' THEN 'architecture'
  WHEN name LIKE '%ฉาบปูน%' OR name LIKE '%ทาสี%' THEN 'finishing'
  WHEN name LIKE '%ไฟฟ้า%' THEN 'mep'
  WHEN name LIKE '%ประปา%' THEN 'mep'
  ELSE 'other'
END
WHERE category IS NULL;

  WHEN name LIKE '%เสา%' THEN 'structure'
  WHEN name LIKE '%คาน%' OR name LIKE '%พื้น%' THEN 'structure'
  WHEN name LIKE '%อิฐ%' OR name LIKE '%ผนัง%' THEN 'architecture'
  WHEN name LIKE '%หลังคา%' THEN 'architecture'
  WHEN name LIKE '%ฉาบปูน%' OR name LIKE '%ทาสี%' THEN 'finishing'
  WHEN name LIKE '%ไฟฟ้า%' THEN 'mep'
  WHEN name LIKE '%ประปา%' THEN 'mep'
  ELSE 'other'
END
WHERE category IS NULL;
